FuncDef:
The multicast shaping command creates and displays the multicast shaping view.
The undo multicast shaping command deletes the multicast shaping view.
By default, the multicast shaping view is not created.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To create and display a multicast shaping view, run the multicast shaping command.
You can configure only one multicast shaping view on one Router.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
